title: Topic 004 Question 077
body: You have a multi-tier app named App1 and an Azure SQL database named SQL1. The backend service of App1 writes data to SQL1. Users use the App1 client to read the data from SQL1.
During periods of high utilization, the users experience delays retrieving the data.
You need to minimize how long it takes for data requests.
What should you include in the solution?
